summary: Provides a collection of geometric and layout helper utilities used in document parsing, including bounding‑box transformations, area and overlap calculations, clustering of text cells, assignment of identifiers, and generation of a logical reading order.
business_intent: Enable accurate layout analysis of scanned or digital documents by offering low‑level operations for handling bounding boxes, detecting intersections, merging and cleaning cell clusters, and establishing a coherent reading sequence for downstream text extraction and processing.
